snippet.title: Chromatrix - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam page to wishlist!: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2859510/Chromatrix/

Chromatrix is a retro tower defense game where color and placement are everything. Upgrade and customize your turrets to counter shifting enemy-types and map configurations. Manage your resources and craft the perfect defense against any attack!
